resources.string:
Register to Hunimanity and join the first universal event app!
This event socialization platform will eliminate the need for multiple single use event apps.
No longer will you need to download an event app for each event you attend and then delete it afterwards to make room for more event apps.
Enter your interests in your profile and connect with events you are registered to attend.
You will then be able to connect with other attendees, locate and connect with others onsite and even in passing in your neighborhood coffee shop!
Join the revolution now!

Register your event.\nIf you will be attending an event and it is not registered with Hunimanity, contact the event organisers to have them sign up.\nYou can send us their information in the registration form as well.
ENTER INTERESTS SEPARATED WITH A SEMICOLON
Phone No.: 212-555-1212 | Hunimanity Address: 123 Rainbow Drive, Utopia | Email Address: contactus@hunimanity.com
